name: Apes Evolution World
description:
Dominate the Earth, menially crave to survive.
Apes contend for hegemony and struggle desperately to accomplish the reluctant path of evolution

- Raise your ape, let them survive from mankind's heavy oppression
- Witness the evolution of science and technology, regain the control to their own destiny
- Intriguing ape evolution, even Darwin was surprised by it
- Discover new evolution route by estimating your proportion of food accordingly to evolution guide
- Collect more food resources easily with mini games
